Texts.Eng: A Protector, you say? Well, that's close enough to being a Guardian...you might not be with SMASH, but we need all the help we can get.
Hmm. You responded to our distress signal? You certainly don't look like you're from around these parts. My name's Zeldia.
Some of my friends are out there, so they might even things out a bit. If you see them, tell them I said hi.
The penguins are swarming all over the highway, causing all sorts of chaos. We're heavily outnumbered here, you'll be facing awful odds.
The penguins won't show you any mercy, so show them none! We've got to restore order to this city!
